page.title: 19HOMELIFE-FAMILY-PETS
page.content: THE OPINION OF THOSE SEEN BY THE CHILDREN IS THAT THIS AREA IS A HOME LOVING CARING STABLE COMMUNITY NICE TO BE A PART OF IN AN OFTEN UNCERTAIN FAST CHANGING WORLD.{THERE ARE MANY {REASONS FOR THIS OPINION TO BE PASSED {ON TO YOU,THE NEW RESEARCHER OF THIS {AREA , WHY ELSE WOULD YOU BE READING {THIS ?}IT IS A LIFE CLOSE TO THE LAND AND EVEN IF ONLY A MIGRANT SYMPATHETIC TO A COUNTRY LIFESTYLE.{WE HAVE OUR {PETS-DOGS,CATS,RABBITS,BIRDS,MICE,RATS {GERBILS,FISH,PONIES,SALAMANDER & LAMB. WE HAVE OUR GARDENS,LAWNS,FLOWERS,BEES WEEDS,SHRUBS,VEGETABLES,SLUGS,ANTS AND INSECTS.{THE PEOPLE ARE HELPFUL,KIND, {CONSIDERATE AND GENEROUS.}THE CHILDREN ARE HAPPY,WILLING,WELL MANNERED AND HEALTHY.{FAMILY,PARISH,DISTRICT,COUNTY {THEN THE NATION, SHOULD FAMILY FALTER, {EVEN IF BY LAW ALLOWED,NATION FOLLOWS. "WE SAY OUR PRAYERS ON GOING TO BED"
